message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to propose a price of $120 to purchase the product.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $140. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think it's worth a bit more than your offer.
I understand your perspective, Alice. While I value your product at $120, I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer for the product would be $135.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I'm still thinking more along the lines of $145. I'm confident that you'll love the product, and I think it's worth a bit more than your last offer.
Thank you for your flexibility, Alice. I am willing to compromise and increase my offer to $140 for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $140. I'm willing to make one more concession and meet you at $142. I think it's a fair price for the product, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it.
